name: Vampiric Jade Statue
condition_immunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.Immutable Form: The statue is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.
traits.Legendary Resistance (3/Day): If the statue fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.Multiattack: The statue makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d6 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, that creature becomes cursed by the statue. The curse lasts for 10 minutes. While the creature is cursed, the statue has advantage on all attacks against it.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d6 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

options.Bite: The statue makes one bite attack.
options.Blood Reaper: All creatures currently cursed by the statue and within 20 feet of it take 5 necrotic damage.
options.Move: The statue moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
